DOC.brief_summary: To establish bioequivalence of flupentixol/melitracen between a new film-coated tablet formulation of 0.5 mg flupentixol/10 mg melitracen and the marketed coated tablet formulation of 0.5 mg flupentixol/10 mg melitracen (Deanxit®), administered as single doses.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study in Healthy Men and Women to Compare Two Pharmaceutical Formulations of Flupentixol/Melitracen (Deanxit®)
DOC.criteria: Healthy men and women ≥18 and ≤55 years of age with a body mass index (BMI) of >18.5 and <30 kg/m2. Women will be nonpregnant and nonlactating. Other protocoldefined inclusion and exclusion criteria may apply.
